bwwExcerpt: First there was football, with the mediocre 'Lombardi.' Then came basketball, with the bad 'Magic/Bird,' and now baseball, with the worse 'Bronx Bombers' (presented with 'special producing partners' the Yankees and Major League Baseball). Wake me when they get to horseshoes.

keyPhrases.quote: Wake me when they get to horseshoes.
